document.full_text: mr. martin was a member of the buffalo sabres' celebrated french connection in the 1970s, and is the team's career leader in hat tricks, scoring three or more goals in a game 21 times.
document.title: rick martin, part of famed n.h.l. line, dies at 59 after car accident
lines_and_colors: mr. martin was a member of the buffalo sabres' celebrated french connection in the 1970s, and is the team's career leader in hat tricks, scoring three or more goals in a game 21 times.
